-The program codes in this folder are to test the accuracy of RER(2,1). 

-"reference.mat" is copied from the previous folder "1.compute_reference_solution".

-Please run "main.m" directly, and it will return:
err =

   3.212522182383486   1.077411934393448   0.287578942205842   0.073018762825564   0.018323743997784   0.004585139725430


Err_order =

   1.576136465134097   1.905540006693813   1.977618909008771   1.994552912927976   1.998676708498075


Gamma_average_save =

   0.008269421072407   0.004132747200317   0.002062914242438   0.001030589774022   0.000515104230736   0.000257509203011


Gamma_average_order =

   1.000685215477624   1.002417268829494   1.001213665485590   1.000533888006934   1.000240396404222
